ratings.question_text: How responsive to student comments was the instructor?
I would give the instructor of this class an overall rating of:
I would give this course an overall rating of:
Apart from how well the course was taught, how valuable is the course to students with interests similar to yours?
Did you participate in a work group as part of this course?

narratives.question_text: Use the space below to comment on questions 1-10, if you wish
comments: I learned a lot from this course and am very glad I took it!
Excellent class covering more advanced material on Environmental Economics. Excellent professor clearly explained key insights and important topics in each paper and great group discussion.
Seeing applications of modeling and hearing Prof. Mendelsohn's advice on how to convey points effectively was extremely helpful.
Professor Mendelsohn created an atmosphere that really allowed us to ask a lot of questions and explore the material in great depth.
Opportunity to work on more advanced material, instructor insights, and class debates.
Instructor very animated, excited about the material, knowledgeable

narratives.question_text: The things about this course most in need of improvement are:
What was the availability and quality of help you received of the instructor and TA?
comments: Just great! Instructor is available, accessible, and very willing to help students.

narratives.question_text: Discuss if you wish how this course fits into your overall program.
comments: I think the course achieved its goal very well of making us all more well-rounded environmental economists to be.

This is an advanced class in environmental economics and fits well in the second year of the program for students with strong backgroung in microeconomics and econometrics as well as doctoral students. It is a rare opportunity to cover really advanced material at F&ES. F&ES needs more classes like this to build more depth on the curriculum.

narratives.question_text: Why did you take this course?
comments: For the chance to cover advanced topics in environmental economics and the opportunity to learn insights directly from one of the leaders in the field.

narratives.question_text: Did it live up to your expectations?
Did you get out of it what you expected?
comments: Yes. It is a great opportunity to study key papers in the field of environmental economics.

narratives.question_text: If yes, what were the advantages and disadvantages of the group work?
comments: It's always good to work with your classmates, and since we come from somewhat different backgrounds, I think we all learned a lot from each other.

narratives.question_text: For students taking this course, what advice would you give them?
comments: It is important to have a strong background in microeconomics, econometrics and environmental economics to take full advantage of this class. If you have it, definitelly take the class. It is a unique opportunity for more advanced study in the field.
